refactorings_applied: [DRY-003] Extracted mapFsError() helper in file-operations.ts to eliminate 6 duplicated Node.js error-to-result mapping catch blocks
[SRP] Extracted findNodeByPath() from inline function in MoveDialog.tsx handleToggleDir callback
[EDGE-CASE] Added invalid date string guard to formatRelativeTime() (returns empty string instead of throwing)
[PERF] Added useMemo for canCopy condition in FileViewer to avoid recalculation on every render
[JSDOC] Enriched JSDoc documentation across all 6 target files: date-utils.ts, file-operations.ts, MoveDialog.tsx, useFileOperations.ts, FileViewer.tsx, FileTreeView.tsx
[TEST] Added 2 new edge case tests for invalid date string handling in date-utils.test.ts
commits: 00960cc: refactor(file-ops): improve code quality for Issue #162
message: Refactoring completed successfully. Applied DRY extraction (mapFsError, findNodeByPath), edge case handling (invalid dates), performance optimization (useMemo), and JSDoc enrichment across all 6 target files. All 3387 tests pass with 0 static analysis errors.
